title: The 9 most famous interpretations of dreaming of a sieve in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a sieve in a dream? It indicates the goodness that the dreamer will find. What does it mean to see someone in a dream because he passes through a sieve? An indication that he is trying to get rid of the problems he suffers from. What is the interpretation of a married woman using a sieve? Evidence that they They will earn money and work well. Interpretation of seeing food sifted in a married woman’s dream? Details of her pregnancy in the near future. What is the interpretation of seeing a sieve in a pregnant woman’s dream? An indication of the abundance of sustenance and goodness. Interpretation of a dream about a sieve by Ibn Sirini. A sieve in a dream generally indicates the goodness that the dreamer will have. Then, if a person sees in a dream that he is cleaning some things with it, this is evidence that the dreamer can distinguish between what is permissible and what is forbidden. After that, if a person sees in a dream that he is using a sieve to clean some materials for himself, this is evidence of the many money that the dreamer will receive. If a person sees himself in a dream passing through a sieve, this is an indication that he is trying to get rid of the problems he is suffering from. Seeing a dream about a sieve by Al-NabulsiThe sieve in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s knowledge and the discrimination he achieves. Losing a sieve in a dream is a sign of disaster and problems that the dreamer will face. Whoever sees in a dream that he is sifting it for himself, will receive many benefits. Hence, seeing food passing through a sieve for other people is evidence that this person is providing a benefit to people. A sieve in a dream shows the insight in which the dreamer is present. The sieve can be in The dream is a sign of freedom from problems and fears, as well as a sign of relief from anxiety. Interpretation of a dream about a sieve for a single woman. A sieve in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence that she will marry a good man. Using a sieve in a girl’s dream is evidence of the money she will get after she was suffering from hardship. Financial. When a girl sees in a dream that she is sifting herself, this indicates that she will achieve many successes. Seeing a dream about a sieve for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself using a sieve in a dream, this is a sign that she will earn money and improve. A married woman holding a sieve in her hand is evidence On the collapse of the problems and the mood in which she experiences all the crises she is experiencing. Sifting food in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will soon become pregnant. Interpretation of a dream about a sieve for a pregnant woman: A sieve in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that the time of birth is approaching and she must be careful. After that, seeing a pregnant woman Sifting her son through a sieve is evidence of kindness and abundant money that she will receive. A sieve in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of the abundance of livelihood and goodness that she will receive.

title: Interpretation of washing in a dream in front of people

preview.html: Bathing in a dream is very disturbing, but in general the vision varies from person to person. Now we try to provide all the general interpretations of the bathroom in visions and dreams from gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing bathing in a dream for one girl. An unmarried woman who sees herself bathing in her dream is a sign of ostentation and purity. Girls’ nudity to bathe in front of people in a dream is a sign that Many things will be revealed about them. Seeing people bathing in the dream of an unmarried girl on the street is a sign of performing the Eid prayer, and the global pillar. A girl who sees herself bathing in front of someone is a sign of her imminent marriage, God willing. Dreaming of bathing in a dream with someone he does not know An unmarried girl is evidence that her request will be answered. A girl who dreams that she is bathing with a dead person is a sign that she is giving alms on her behalf or praying for those around her for good. This dream also indicates that the girl can avoid suspicious and corrupt actions. Dreaming about bathing in a dream from The impurity of an unmarried girl indicates repentance and a return to God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of a dream about bathing in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing bathing in a dream for a married woman. Bathing after menstruation for a married woman is a sign of sincere repentance and commitment to her rights and duties. A dream about bathing with someone in a dream for a married woman indicates A joint request or cooperation with her husband, according to the vision. To see a married woman washing and bathing in front of people is evidence of purity and chastity. For a married woman to take off her clothes in a dream in order to take a shower, this means warning her that she is revealing many things about her private life. A married woman who dreams of bathing In front of people with her clothes on is a sign of getting rid of all difficulties in her life’s affairs. Bathing with cold water in a dream for a married woman is a sign of getting rid of all differences and problems in her life. Hot water and bathing in it for a married woman is an indication that she hates her neighbor in something that she lacks, so she prays. Interpretation of a vision Bathing in a dream about a man and its meaning. A man who dreams that he is generally bathing in a dream is evidence of repentance or the conversion of an infidel to Islam. The vision also indicates that if he sees himself eavesdropping on others while bathing in a dream, then he examines people’s genitals. When seeing people bathing in the street, This dream indicates a birthday celebration or a prayer after the Eid prayer. A man who sees his wife bathing in a dream is purified by menstruation or childbirth. Seeing a dead person whom the man does not really know, bathing, indicates funeral prayers for an absent person. Bathing a dead person in a dream and knowing him : Funeral prayer with a request to the imam of the mosque to repay the deceased’s debt on his behalf. A man who sees one of his parents performing ablution fulfills all worldly matters for him and pays off his debt or goes for Hajj. Seeing a bathroom with a stranger in a dream, this is evidence that he is participating with his friends in entreaties from beyond the invisible. Bathing With a familiar face in a dream is a sign of sincere repentance and family ties.Confirm

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person carrying a rosary

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person carrying a rosary: ​​Seeing a deceased person swimming and holding a rosary in his hand in a dream is one of the dreams that brings confidence to the dreamer’s heart, and it is a message that indicates the good condition of the deceased and that he is happy and his work is good. If a person sees a dead person in a dream swimming and carrying a rosary in his hand, this indicates a good condition. The deceased and that God Almighty has honored him with goodness, and that he has done good deeds. During his life, this vision gives the dreamer a lot of reassurance and comfort. Seeing a dead person swimming in a dream means that he is a good, religious person who adheres to the laws of God Almighty and the teachings of the true Islamic religion. But if one sees in a dream that the rosary that the dead person carried in the dream is incomplete or not in order, then this It indicates that the person has many sins. Asking a deceased person for the rosary in a dream: If someone sees in a dream someone he knows, but who is under the protection of God Almighty, and he asks for the rosary in the dream, then this is a sign or message that this person needs prayers, and a lot of alms and inquiries. Forgiveness for him. If you see the deceased asking for the rosary in a dream, this may mean that it is good news for the dreamer and that fears and problems will disappear in the near future. In the event that you see the deceased swimming in a dream, this means that the dreamer will be blessed with an abundance of wealth in the coming period, as it shows the abundance of livelihood in life. In general and not just with money, God is higher and more knowledgeable about this subject. When you dream of giving the rosary to a deceased person, this indicates an improvement in the dreamer’s circumstances in the future, a change in circumstances for the better, and if he has debts, he will pay them. If one sees himself giving the rosary to a dead person In a dream, it means that the dreamer will reach the goals he aspires to achieve and achieve everything he dreams of. When someone sees in a dream that he is giving a rosary to a dead person, this means that the dreamer has achieved his goals and may indicate the end of hostility between him and another person that many Various conflicts and problems occurred between them. And it indicates that I hear some good news, God willing. Interpretation of the deceased holding a rosary in a dream for a single woman. Interpretations vary depending on the vision and the difference in God, and some interpretations about seeing the dead holding the rosary in a single girl’s dream can be clarified as follows: When an unmarried girl sees She is swimming in the dream, this means that the Gulf is approaching, and she will live many happy moments in the coming period of her life, and she will receive a lot of good news. But if the girl praises God in the dream in front of a large group of people, this means that the girl will face many crises and problems. In the coming period, but these problems will be resolved soon. If a girl sees that she is praying at someone’s wedding, this means that this girl will hear good news in the coming period. When a girl sees that there are people saying tasbeeh in a dream, this means that the girl will get some Easy and simple tasks. Interpretation of the deceased carrying a rosary in a dream for a married woman. Interpretations vary according to many opinions.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing watermelon

preview.html: If he raises his hand to the sky and takes it, this indicates that the dreamer is asking for money and prestige, and he will obtain it with his life, and if he takes a watermelon from the ground, it shows exhaustion at work. Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is buying watermelon and has no money. It indicates the crises that you will experience in the coming period, but you will overcome them. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is happily taking a watermelon from the sky in her dream. It indicates that she will gain a high position in her work, whether she is working or studying, God willing. Likewise, an unmarried girl Who sees watermelon in a dream and did not eat it, and it seemed delicious to her in the dream. It explains something that this lonely girl wants to achieve in her life and is facing many problems. If an unmarried girl sees a lot of watermelon in a dream and she is very happy with her appearance. It indicates that she will succeed in Her life and other matters, God willing, without pressure or trouble. See also: Interpretation of a dream about eating watermelon in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that watermelon was abundant in the dream in front of her. It indicates that she will get rid of the severe suffering that She lived it and saw it in her life. And for a married woman to see that she gets a watermelon in a dream from the sky and she desires it. It indicates that she will obtain food, abundant money, and goodness in her life always and forever, God willing. If a married woman sees a watermelon in a dream and she seems hungry in A dream. Here is a clear interpretation that she will face some crises in her life. Suffering. A married woman is looking for a watermelon in a dream but did not find it in the dream. It indicates that she will suffer in her life during this time as well, but it will end soon, God willing. Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream for a divorced woman. If A divorced woman saw in a dream, she looks at a watermelon and is happy to see it in the dream. It indicates the new life that she will see and live in happily, God willing. Thus, the divorced woman who in a dream is looking for a watermelon to eat from in her dream. This indicates that she is trying to find something important In her life and faces problems. The divorced woman who looks at a watermelon in a dream and takes it from the sky happily. It is a sign that she will gain some status in her life and will always live with beautiful things. The divorced woman who sees that a stranger gave her a watermelon in a dream and takes it. She will happily marry this dreamer very soon. Great. Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream for a man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is looking at watermelon, and he is interrupted in the dream and longs. An indication that he will achieve many things that he was striving for in this period of his life. And if the dreamer sees a lot of watermelon in a dream, and he has no money To buy them in a dream. It explains that he will get rid of problems in his life, but after a long time, and God is Most High and Knows. And the man who looks at the sky and takes a watermelon from it in a dream and is happy with it. Here is a clear explanation that he will obtain a high position in his work or an important matter that he follows. And seeing the

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing my grandmother crying in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams in which I see my grandmother crying in a dream. You ask what is the interpretation of the dream? Interpretation of the dream of seeing my grandmother crying in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing my grandmother crying in a dream can be a sign of goodness and happiness, God willing, as seeing the grandmother crying can indicate a strong relationship with the grandmother, by God. I know that when you see a grandmother crying in a dream, it can be a sign of joy, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her grandmother crying without a sound in a dream, this may indicate her need for care and help, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. I dreamed that my dead grandmother was calling me in a dream. I dreamed of my dead grandmother praying for me in In a dream, the supplication of the dead can bring goodness to the living, and God knows the unseen. When you see a supplication for the living from among the dead, it can lead to relief from problems and worries, God willing. If the dreamer sees a supplication from the dead, it may be a sign of peace of mind, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees the supplication from the dead It may relieve him of anxiety, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother wearing gold in a dream. Likewise, if the dreamer sees his grandmother angry In a dream, this may be a sign of a problem in the family, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. title: Read the full interpretations of a dream about riding a horse in a dream

preview.html: Riding in a dreamHorses are animals that symbolize strength, courage and kindness, so when seeing them in a dream, the viewer is engaged in searching for the meaning and message of the vision. You are watching. The interpretation of a dream about riding a horse or a horse in a dream. The interpretation of seeing and riding a horse in a dream varies according to the details and facts, and in the following lines we will convey to you the interpretation of the vision of the leading jurists, which is as follows: Riding a gray horse in a dream for an unmarried young man, portends marriage to a woman. Fair desired by this young man. If a married man sees in a dream that he will ride a beautiful horse with two wings, then this vision is praiseworthy and one of the best dreams ever, as its interpretation portends the dreamer reaching a prominent position. If a horse appears flying in the sky while the dreamer is riding it, this indicates On the honour, pride and prestige that the dreamer realizes. Seeing him riding without a saddle is evidence that the dreamer is acquiring great wealth or amassing a large sum of money, through hard work and fatigue, and this interpretation differs from the meaning given by many dream interpreters. Such a dream, according to... for them. , indicates the loss and disintegration of hopes and dreams. Also, seeing him overcoming obstacles quickly explains that the dreamer is a brave person who is not afraid of danger and adventure in all aspects of his life. As for seeing him stepping on a river or stream, this indicates success and success on the practical and professional level, and if The fortuneteller noticed that this stream that the horse passes through is dry and devoid of water, as this indicates failure. And lack of success at work. As far as the interpretation of drinking horse milk is concerned, it is an indication of the benefit that the dreamer derives from a prominent figure of status and power, and perhaps what is meant by it is the shop owner. If the dreamer sees that he is eating horse meat, then this dream means victory over enemies and may It will be a promotion at work. If a married man dreams that he replaces the horse he is riding with another, this indicates his separation from his first wife and his marriage to another woman. Interpretation of a dream about riding a horse. Interpretation of seeing riding in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing him in a dream from Ibn Sirin’s point of view has many meanings and connotations. They are as follows: Riding a horse in a dream for a young man in a dream is a sign of engagement and marriage. But if an unmarried young man sees in a dream that he is riding on the back of a female horse, then this is good news for him that he will marry a beautiful woman with good birth. Seeing wild horses that he cannot The dreamer controlling it, means that the dreamer will face problems in the coming period. If the dreamer sees himself falling from the back of a horse, this is a warning of getting into trouble on a practical level, and the dreamer may commit sins that displease the Lord (Glory be to Him). Riding in a dream for Imam Al-SadiqTo ride a horse in The dream has many meanings and interpretations, as explained by Imam Al-Sadiq, and they are as follows: Riding a brown horse in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of her short commitment and it could be a sign of the stability of her life and a sense of satisfaction and peace of mind. If a married woman sees a horse entering her home, this indicates many Kindness at that

title: Interpretation of eating chocolate in a dream - to see chocolate in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of chocolate for a single, married, pregnant or divorced woman, whether she is distributing the purchase of black food or gifting sweets to Ibn Sirin, etc. Interpretation of a dream about chocolate by Ibn Sirin If you see yourself eating chocolate, this indicates satisfaction with your life. If someone gives you chocolate, know that it will bring you some trouble, followed by A lot of good This is how you give chocolate to someone If you see yourself with chocolate, know that you will be stigmatized by a partner who blames you for your success If you dream of chocolate, it means that you will give abundant gifts to those who depend on you. If you see chocolate candy, it means acceptable friends and jobs. If the chocolate is sour, illness or other disappointments will follow. If you drink liquid chocolate, this foretells that you will recover from a period of negative adversity. If you dream only of chocolate, it means that you will participate in an important event that will leave positive results in your life. And if you drink hot chocolate in a dream, it means that you will meet an incomparable love in life. Realistic, and if you have a partner or husband, it means that your relationship with him will flare up strongly again. And if you do not have a partner, you should be prepared because you will soon meet your love. If you dream of a chocolate bar and bite it, this is a sign of new developments that you will see soon. Hard chocolate means some trouble, but with a positive outcome. But if it is soft, then whatever you do will work. A negative interpretation is that you dream of bad chocolate, which indicates that you will be disappointed in love or in your partner. And if you dream of well-wrapped chocolate but you did not like it when you eat it, this means that you will go through a period Disappointment and some things you don't expect may happen. This dream could mean some kind of betrayal by friends or relatives. If you dream of melted chocolate, this is a sign of success in all the deals you will make and you may receive unexpected help. If you dream that you cannot reach chocolate in a dream, this is a sign of Joy mixed with distress. Interpretation of chocolate in a dream. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing chocolate in a dream indicates the coming of goodness, happiness and joy in that person’s life, but if one sees that he is buying chocolate in a dream, this means that that person will meet a new friend. Interpretation of the gift of chocolate in a dreamIf he sees In a person’s dream, he offers chocolate to people close to him, this indicates that he loves people and always does good. Interpretation of eating chocolate in a dream: If a person sees that he is eating chocolate filled with hazelnuts and nuts, this indicates that this person will obtain a great livelihood without fatigue or hardship from others. Interpretation of chocolate in one’s dream. Dream interpretation scholars say that if a single girl sees in her dream that she is eating white chocolate, this means that she is living in a state of emotional stability. But if she sees that she is eating chocolate with a sweet and delicious taste, then

title: Interpretation of a dream about spraying perfume on single women according to Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about spraying perfume for single womenInterpretation of a dream about spraying perfume for single women in a dreamIs he familiar with the fun concepts that will be explained in detail in the next article, and we will also explain the different types of perfumes and what is the interpretation of good perfumes and perfumes with bad smells? Follow the following paragraphs.You have a dream that confuses you. Wait.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Spraying perfume. Interpretation of a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of a dream about spraying perfume for a single girl explains that she can reach an important stage of psychological comfort and calm in her life, but on the condition that the perfumes are good and do not harm her, because if she sees that. Her perfumes caused burns to her body, then the dream indicates a wrong choice for the dreamer or wrong decisions that she may make soon. Spraying perfume in a dream for unmarried people indicates religiosity and purity of heart and body, specifically if she buys oud perfumes and continues to spray them on her body and in her home, this is interpreted as They devote and don't do it. Deviating from the provisions of religion and the Prophetic hadiths. When she sees a young man she knows spraying her with fragrant perfume, he wants her to be his wife, and in return he will provide her with all the means of luxury and comfort in her life. If the dreamer sprays perfume in a dream, and the bottle falls from her hand and the perfume completely breaks and the perfume spills from it, Miller said that the dream is a sign of the loss of a special opportunity in the dreamer’s life, and she may sigh and be sad in her life because of the loss of something. Interpretation of a dream of spraying perfume for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin pointed out the gentle interpretations of the symbol of perfume, which is praise and positive speech for the dreamer who is full of motivation and positive energy around her Because of her purity, good morals, and good dealing with others. And if she is late in the known requirements and duties of religion, such as prayer, fasting, reading the Qur’an, etc., and dreams of a handsome sheikh wearing beautiful clothes and spraying beautiful perfumes on them, then this is a sign that she will take off the clothing of disobedience and disobedience to God and will put on the clothing of guidance and repentance and stop. About committing sins soon. Ibn Sirin said that spraying attractive perfumes in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her good livelihood, such as her entry into a new job whose money is permissible, or her marriage to a young man of good character whose personality is full of positive qualities or God Almighty. Allowing her to recover from the illness and escape from the pain and psychological suffering that she felt before. The most important interpretations of a dream about spraying perfume for a single woman. Interpretation of dreams about spraying perfume on clothes for single women When the dreamer sprays perfume on her clothes, this is a sign that she will meet a life partner who suits her spiritually and personally and marry him. Even if she is traveling and wants to leave her country so that he can join her. A job she wants, or she completes her education and obtains an important educational certificate and sees herself spraying beautiful imported perfumes. If a woman gives one of her relatives her precious perfumes to spray on her clothes, then that woman wants her as a bride for her son, and will give her love and self-control in her next life. What is the interpretation of a dream about spraying perfume for a single woman?

title: Interpretation of a dream about dawn prayer after sunrise

preview.html: But what about the interpretation of a dream about dawn prayer after sunrise? Its interpretation varies according to the personality of the fortuneteller, and this is what we will know in our topic today from gptafser.com/.Interpretation of a dream about dawn prayer after sunrise in a dream for a single girl: seeing a single girl in her dream that she is performing the dawn prayer after sunrise The Sun. What proves that this girl does not understand anything about religion and Islam and that she must approach and learn about her duties. And a sign for the girl to return to God, repent to Him, and learn the matters of her religion. Seeing a single girl’s dream that she is praying Fajr alone in a dream is a sign for the girl that God will correct her situation. Whether by work or a good husband. If a girl sees in a dream that she is performing the dawn prayer alone, but she is wearing dirty clothes. The dream shows that this girl’s life will be filled with problems. The dream may be a sign for her that her marriage or engagement will be delayed. - Regularity of the dawn prayer in The dream of an unmarried girl. It indicates that this girl’s petition to God will be granted and she will find a lot of goodness in her life. Seeing a single girl in her sleep at dawn shows a lot of goodness in her life. The dream may be a sign of her close marriage to a good, God-fearing man. Seeing the dawn In a dream for a single girl, it is an indication of the peace and stability that this insight experiences in her dream. See also: Interpretation of a dream about dawn prayer. Watch the performance of dawn prayer after sunrise in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in her dream that she is performing the dawn prayer and the sun has appeared. The vision shows that the dreamer is exposed to many The problems in her life cannot be solved. Unless she approaches God Almighty, prays a lot, and prays in her life. In the case of a married woman appearing performing the dawn prayer with her children at home. This indicates that God will rectify her situation and ease her distress soon. But if A married woman saw in her dream that she was performing the dawn prayer behind her husband. The dream indicates the existence of a stable family life in which she lives with her husband and her family. If a married woman sees that she hears the dawn call to prayer in her sleep and does not pray, the dream shows the transgressions and sins present in the married woman’s life. At the same time , a sign of quickly approaching God so that God Almighty can fix the situation of her family and her condition. A woman’s vision in a dream is that she sees her husband praying and standing as an imam, and who is behind him in the mosque. The dream indicates that her husband will soon be blessed by God with money and that good will will prevail over him and his family. In the event that a married woman sees dawn in a dream. This indicates the stability of her life and the calm in which this woman lives her life. Seeing the dawn prayer before sunrise. It indicates that the married woman will become pregnant in the future very soon. Seeing the dawn prayer in general for a married woman, Evidence of the extent of marital happiness experienced by a woman. Interpretation of seeing the dawn prayer after sunrise in a dream for a man and its meaning. Whoever sees that he prayed dawn after sunrise and the dreamer becomes ill. This indicates that this fortuneteller will become more and more seriously ill, leading to his death, and God knows best. If he sees The dreamer is praying Fajr

title: Interpretation of seeing mosques by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of mosques by Ibn Sirin, through our article today we present the interpretation of the vision of mosques by Ibn Sirin, and the mosque is the house of God to which His faithful servants go so that they may meet God Almighty in praying for them. Praying that His Majesty will be pleased with them and admit them into His Paradise offered by heaven and earth. And the mosques belong to God, so do not invite anyone to God), and the dreamer can see the mosque during his sleep in several ways, such as entering it, sitting in it, walking in it, or leaving it. Interpretation of seeing mosques according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin says: Seeing the mosque in a dream is good news for the pioneer. . Below is a detail of what was narrated by Ibn Sirin in: Converting a house into a mosque symbolizes the righteousness and piety of its people. Seeing a woman in the mosque means a happy life and the fulfillment of desires. Seeing the dreamer that he is building a mosque in a dream indicates his justice, piety, and concern for his family. Visiting the mosque in a dream symbolizes To the dreamer's desire to maintain family ties and not sever ties with his relatives. Entering the mosque and entering through its door is evidence of approaching God and engaging in sin. Seeing the mosque without a carpet or a torn rug symbolizes the dreamer's failure to perform his duties and commit sins. Seeing the dreamer dying In the mosque, it indicates that God Almighty will not take his soul unless he is pleased with him, and God Almighty knows best. The gathering of pilgrims around the dreamer in a dream indicates his wisdom, the salvation of the mind, and his great position among them. Seeing a mosque in a dream for an unmarried woman, according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained seeing a mosque for a woman. Unmarried in a dream, and we quote it as follows: Visiting the mosque in a dream for single people means satisfying desires and achieving goals. A person’s visit to the mosque in a dream symbolizes God Almighty’s response to her prayers for her and His satisfaction with her. Sitting in the mosque in a dream indicates the good news that it may represent. Preaching. An unmarried woman who builds a mosque in a dream indicates high status and position, and this may indicate marriage to a good and righteous man. Interpretation of dreams for entering and leaving the mosque. Here is the interpretation of the vision of entering and leaving the mosque as follows: Entering the mosque indicates the beginning of a life Happy in which the dreamer’s situation changes for the better. An unmarried woman entering the mosque in a dream is evidence of engagement or marriage. It also indicates finding a job if the unmarried woman is looking for work in reality. Seeing a pregnant woman entering the mosque in a dream indicates the approaching date. Her birth, and that God Almighty will provide her with a male fetus that will have a great status in society, God willing. Leaving the mosque after performing the prayer indicates that the dreamer has begun a new stage in his life in which he will succeed. Interpretation of a dream about sitting in the mosque: The dreamer sitting in the mosque in a dream shows his commitment to performing His duties, worship, and preparation for zakat. Sitting in the mosque in a dream indicates the abundance of sustenance and the satisfaction of desires. Sitting in the mosque in a dream symbolizes that God Almighty will hear the dreamer’s prayer and that he will respond to him. If the dreamer approaches a commercial project and
